definition: A natural or legal person, public authority, agency or other body that develops an AI system or a general-purpose AI model or that has an AI system or a general-purpose AI model developed and places it on the market or puts the AI system into service under its own name or trademark, whether for payment or free of charge.
keyPoints: Places on market under own name

definition: A natural or legal person, public authority, agency or other body using an AI system under its authority except where the AI system is used in the course of a personal non-professional activity.
keyPoints: Has specific obligations for high-risk AI
Must conduct FRIA in certain cases

definition: A natural or legal person located or established in the Union who has received and accepted a written mandate from a provider of an AI system or a general-purpose AI model to, respectively, perform and carry out on its behalf the obligations and procedures established by this Regulation.
A natural or legal person located or established in the Union that places on the market an AI system that bears the name or trademark of a natural or legal person established in a third country.
A natural or legal person in the supply chain, other than the provider or the importer, that makes an AI system available on the Union market.
A provider, product manufacturer, deployer, authorised representative, importer or distributor.
A natural person who is subject to or otherwise affected by an AI system.
A conformity assessment body notified in accordance with this Regulation and other relevant Union harmonisation legislation.
